results.definition: be a signal for or a symptom of
examples: These symptoms indicate a serious illness
Her behavior points to a severe neurosis
The economic indicators signal that the euro is undervalued

results.definition: indicate a place, direction, person, or thing; either spatially or figuratively
examples: I showed the customer the glove section
He pointed to the empty parking space
indicated his wishes in a letter
The evidence argues for your claim
The results indicate the need for more work

results.definition: suggest the necessity of an intervention; in medicine
examples: Tetracycline is indicated in such cases
